item.description:
OK, this isn't hiking but let's expand a little on dancing as an alternate theme for the winter months. Let's experimentally check out Scandinavian Folk Dancing!

 

Sunday, February 26, 2012 from 2:00 pm until 5:30 pm.

All levels of dancers are welcome. Live & recorded music. Local and guest teachers. Lessons in ½ hr. increments: Beginner lesson; review of last session; Basics party; Swedish lesson; Norwegian lesson; 1 hr. Party.

Suggested but not required donation of $5-10, pay what you can.

Gammalpolska (a couples polka-like dance) from Follinge and Gangar.

(The Always on Sunday International Folk Dance with more Scandi dances is in the same location that day, from 7-10 pm)

Contact Charlie Mandelberg for more info: mandelpols@gmail.com

 

Location/directions to approximate meetup location at Temple Beth Torah (130 Main Street, Wethersfield, CT):
http://classic.mapquest.com/maps?city=Wethersfield&state=CT&address=130+Main+St&zipcode=06109-3126&country=US&latitude=41.7097&longitude=-72.65464&geocode=ADDRESS

Definition of Gammalpolska Dancing (couple-turning dance):
http://www.phantomranch.net/folkdanc/dances/gammalpo.htm 

Definition of various Scandi Folk Dances and a little Etiquette:
http://www.folkdance.com/scandi/whatitis.htm

Video clip of a few Scandi Folk Dancing styles (one or more at event?):
http://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mc3oULXIxCE

Temple Beth Torah -Main website (facility hosting the event)
http://templebethtorahwethersfield.org/home/

 

=== Legal Stuff ===

By clicking on "Yes" for this event you agree, warrant, and covenant as follows: In consideration for accepting this entry, I, the registrant, intending to be legally bound, hereby, for myself, my heirs, my executors and administrators, do waive and release any and all rights for damages I may have against any parties or persons connected with the Hartford Area Hiking meetup group for and related to the above listed event. I attest and verify that I am physically fit to participate in any portion of this above listed event. I grant Hartford Area Hiking permission to use any photographs, film or videotapes of this event for any purpose.
